languages.text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но по злорадству в ее голосе вы можете поклясться, что она улыбается.{/n} "И он помнит тебя, {name} фон Валанциус. Твои потешные {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}игры в спасителя{/d} забавляют тех, кто по настоящему властвует над их судьбами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но по злорадству в ее голосе вы можете поклясться, что она улыбается.{/n} "И он помнит тебя, {name} фон Валанциус. Твои потешные игры в спасителя забавляют тех, кто по настоящему властвует над их судьбами".

languages.text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."
languages.original_text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но по злорадству в ее голосе вы можете поклясться, что она улыбается.{/n} "И он помнит тебя, {name} фон Валанциус. Твои потешные {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}игры в спасителя{/d} забавляют тех, кто по настоящему властвует над их судьбами".

traits.locale_text: {n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she's smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly saviour fantasy you act out only amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

{n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she's smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly saviour fantasy you act out only amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

{n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she's smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly saviour fantasy you act out only amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

{n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she's smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly saviour fantasy you act out only amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

{n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly saviour fantasy you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

{n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly saviour fantasy you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

languages.text: {n}Du siehst das Gesicht der Frau hinter ihrer Maske nicht, doch ihrem bösartigen triumphalen Ton nach zu urteilen grinst sie wohl.{/n} "Und er erinnert sich an Euch, {name} von Valancius. Eure alberne {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Rettungsfantasie{/d} amüsiert die wahren Meister über das Schicksal dieser Leute nur."
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst das Gesicht der Frau hinter ihrer Maske nicht, doch ihrem bösartigen triumphalen Ton nach zu urteilen grinst sie wohl.{/n} "Und er erinnert sich an Euch, {name} von Valancius. Eure alberne Rettungsfantasie amüsiert die wahren Meister über das Schicksal dieser Leute nur."

languages.text: {n}Vous ne voyez pas le visage de la femme, caché derrière son masque, mais vous supposez au ton triomphal de sa voix qu'elle sourit.{/n} « Et il se souvient de vous, {name} von Valancius. Votre rôle de {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}{mf|sauveur|sauveuse} fantoche{/d} n'amuse que les véritables maîtres de la destinée de ces gens. »
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne voyez pas le visage de la femme, caché derrière son masque, mais vous supposez au ton triomphal de sa voix qu'elle sourit.{/n} « Et il se souvient de vous, {name} von Valancius. Votre rôle de {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} fantoche n'amuse que les véritables maîtres de la destinée de ces gens. »

languages.text: {n}你看不见那个女人藏在面具后面的脸，但她语气中流露出胜利般的恶意，让你意识到她是在窃笑。{/n}“他还记得你，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你那愚蠢的{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}救世主幻想{/d}，只会逗笑那些真正主宰命运的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

traits.locale_text: {n}你看不见那个女人藏在面具后面的脸，但她语气中流露出胜利般的恶意，让你意识到她是在窃笑。{/n}“他还记得你，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你那愚蠢的救世主幻想，只会逗笑那些真正主宰命运的人。”

languages.text: {n}仮面の後ろの女の顔は見えないが、嫌味な勝ち誇った口調から考えて、女は笑っていると言い切れた。{/n}「そして、あの方は貴様を覚えている、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。その馬鹿らしい{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}救世主の幻想{/d}を演じても、民の運命の真の主を楽しませているだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

traits.locale_text: {n}仮面の後ろの女の顔は見えないが、嫌味な勝ち誇った口調から考えて、女は笑っていると言い切れる。{/n}「そして、あの方は貴様を覚えている、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。その馬鹿らしい救世主の幻想を演じても、民の運命の真の主を楽しませるだけだ」

languages.text: {n}No puedes ver el rostro de la mujer tras su máscara, pero a juzgar por su tono de triunfo malévolo, podrías jurar que está sonriendo.{/n} «Y se acuerda de ti, {name} von Valancius. La estúpida {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}fantasía salvadora{/d} que representas no hace más que divertir a los verdaderos dueños del destino de esas personas».
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

traits.locale_text: {n}No puedes ver el rostro de la mujer tras su máscara, pero a juzgar por su tono de triunfo malévolo, podrías jurar que está sonriendo.{/n} «Y se acuerda de ti, {name} von Valancius. La estúpida fantasía salvadora que representas no hace más que divertir a los verdaderos dueños del destino de esas personas».

languages.text: {n}Kadının maskenin ardındaki yüzünü göremiyorsun ancak habis zaferinin tadını çıkarıyormuşçasına konuşması, onun gülümsediğini düşündürtüyor.{/n} "Seni de hatırlıyor {name} von Valancius. Acınası {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}kahraman olma fantezilerin{/d}, insanların kaderine yön veren gerçek efendileri eğlendiriyor."
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but judging by her tone of malicious triumph, you could swear she is smiling.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. The silly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}saviour fantasy{/d} you have been acting out amuses the true masters of those people's fates."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maskenin ardında gizli suretini göremiyorsun ancak bedhah zaferinin tadını çıkarıyormuşça konuşması, kadının gülümsediğini düşündürüyor.{/n} "Ayrıca seni hatırlıyor {name} von Valancius. Acınası kahraman kompleksin, insanların kaderine yön veren gerçek efendileri eğlendiriyor."
